name: Stichting Pagan Federation International
membership: PFI is an affiliated organisation with PF/ Pagan Federation and PFI Deutschland e.V
goal:
To defend the rights of pagans.
To facilitate networking amongst pagans and interested parties.
Building bridges between many different organisations and people who uphold the sacredness of the Earth
To provide correct information about (neo)paganism, nature religions, heathenism and other indigenous groups.
interests: Communication, Culture, Education and training, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
euInitiatives: To supply information about paganism. Defending the rights of pagans and advocating the freedom of worship.
